value.name: South Pasadena fatal officer-involved shooting investigation underway
value.description: The incident occurred around 1 a.m. Family members say Justo Quintero, 31 ... South Pasadena police responded to the area and detained the suspect, who was suffering from gunshot wounds to ...

value.name: Family of man fatally shot by cop in South Pasadena speaks out
value.description: They marched alongside friends and family to remember Justo Quintero, 31 ... "I just need answers, and why the police are not doing nothing. They're not arresting this man."
